attributes.additional_details: we want the goverment to follow other EU countries lead like germany's and scrap plans for new nuclear power stations, nuclear costs too much money 'billions' and we would'nt get power from them  until years after ,this money could be better spent on clean renewable energies, nuclear is also very dangerous, ok we dont have the threat of earthquakes but terrorism is a real threat,  if germany can do it so can we
